Speaker: Erçilio Freitas da Costa, 28 years. Speaks no local vernacular besides Tetun Dili. Speaks Indonesian, and a little English. Born in Viqueque, grew up in Dili. Lives in Dili, Santa Cruz. Highest education SMA, in training as policeman. Worked as driver and assisted in the interviews during the surveys.
name: TDT_Tetun Dili_MK_2002_word list
